    Class and Description
    at.tuwien.ifs.somtoolbox.apps.viewer.controls.ColourLegendTable
    use ClassColorTableModel and an ordinary JTable instead.
    at.tuwien.ifs.somtoolbox.util.RandomTools

    Field and Description
    at.tuwien.ifs.somtoolbox.apps.viewer.MapPNode.visualizations

  • Deprecated Methods 
    Method and Description
    at.tuwien.ifs.somtoolbox.apps.viewer.ControlCollector.add(AbstractViewerControl)
    use ControlCollector.addControl(AbstractViewerControl, boolean) directly.
    at.tuwien.ifs.somtoolbox.apps.viewer.ControlCollector.add(AbstractViewerControl, Object)
    use ControlCollector.addControl(AbstractViewerControl, boolean) directly.
    at.tuwien.ifs.somtoolbox.apps.viewer.ControlCollector.add(TitledCollapsiblePanel)

    at.tuwien.ifs.somtoolbox.apps.viewer.ControlCollector.addControl(TitledCollapsiblePanel)
    use ControlCollector.addControl(AbstractViewerControl, boolean) instead.
    at.tuwien.ifs.commons.util.MathUtils.cap(int, int)
    use Math.min(int, int) instead.
    at.tuwien.ifs.commons.util.MathUtils.cap(long, long)
    use Math.min(long, long) instead.
    at.tuwien.ifs.commons.util.MathUtils.capLower(int, int)
    use Math.max(int, int) instead
    at.tuwien.ifs.somtoolbox.util.VectorTools.getIndexOfMaxValue(double...)

    at.tuwien.ifs.somtoolbox.util.VectorTools.getIndicesOfMaxValuesOLD(int[], int)

    at.tuwien.ifs.somtoolbox.apps.viewer.MapPNode.getThematicClassMapVisualizer()

    use Visualizations instead
    at.tuwien.ifs.somtoolbox.apps.viewer.MapPNode.getVisualizations()
    use Visualizations.singleton instead
    at.tuwien.ifs.somtoolbox.apps.viewer.fileutils.PocketSOMFormatUtils.lightenMapFormat(String, String, String, String, float)
    since streaming works this is not needed anymore (it never worked very well anyway)
    at.tuwien.ifs.somtoolbox.apps.viewer.controls.psomserver.PocketSOMConnector.main(String[])
    should not be started directly
    at.tuwien.ifs.somtoolbox.util.FileUtils.prepareOutputDir(String)

    at.tuwien.ifs.somtoolbox.util.VectorTools.removeIndex(double[], int)
